Current Version: 	PowerShell-6.1.1-win-x86
Downloaded From:	https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases

We need tom periodically update the PowerShell.zip file with the latest
stable version of PowerShell Core.  Note that this needs to be the 
32-bit version.

Download the ZIP archive and replace the [Powershell-win-x86.zip] file.
